name: Galactae: Space Age Drawn
description:
Galactae is an real time strategy game in space, where your choose your leader type to enhance your influence on the galaxy. Depending on your choice, your conquest options, people morale and economical status of your nation will be harder or easyier to manage.

Links:

Official Website: https://galactae.eu
